<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Belt of the Five Kings](/Equipment.aspx?ID=410)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 606 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 650 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn belt

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Made from interlocking plates of silver and gold, this heavy belt bears stylized miniature images of five kingly dwarves. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression with dwarves or make a Request from dwarves. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Intimidation checks against giants and orcs.

 The belt also grants you darkvision and the ability to understand, speak, and write the Dwarven language.

<document level="2" id="action-235" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
